metadata.description: Bluewater celebrates the lives of the icons and activists, performers and pundits who have made a difference in the LGBTQ community. Celebrate with us in this graphic novel featuring the stories behind the musicians Cher, Madonna, and Kylie Minogue, television personalities Tom Daley, Kathy Griffin, Anderson Cooper, and Rosie O'Donnell, and the effervescent RuPaul. A special edition in collaboration with the popular LGBTQ website Lez Get Real.
metadata.name: The Big Gay Comic Book
